text:
Hey everyone, CLI update broke my setup. Everything was ok, I have over 30 modules, and after the update and running `watch` I can see only 12 modules on any page editor.

I tried to update the label on `meta.json`  but they still refuse to appear under “Modules” on the pages editor.

If I stop cli `watch` and make a small edit on the html on a module and save it via the Web Design Manager they re-appear on my pages..

Any ideas on what in the name of God could be happening?
